modules.title: Ho Mamela le ho Bala (Listening and Reading)
modules.description: Developing comprehension skills through listening and reading Sesotho texts.
objectives: Understand spoken Sesotho in different contexts
Read and comprehend texts of 600-700 words

modules.title: Ho Bua le ho Ngola (Speaking and Writing)
modules.description: Developing expressive skills in speaking and writing Sesotho.
objectives: Use appropriate vocabulary for different contexts

modules.title: Sebopeho sa Puo (Language Structure)
modules.description: Understanding Sesotho grammar and sentence structure.
objectives: Identify and use different parts of speech

modules.title: Bophelo le Phelisano (Life and Social Interaction)
modules.description: Cultural context and social practices in Basotho society.
objectives: Use appropriate language in social situations

modules.title: Lingoloa (Literature)
modules.description: Study of Sesotho literary forms and analysis.

modules.title: Mekhoa ea ho Ngola (Writing Forms)
modules.description: Master different forms of Sesotho writing.
